name: Sick_girl
text:
Sick girl
"Please, we have to get home! She's sick!"
 ―Her guardian
An unidentified sick girl was caught in a traffic jam outside the Double R Diner after a boy fired a gun out of his car.
The girl and a woman were driving to make a 6:30 dinner with the girl's uncle, whom she hadn't seen in a long while, when they were stalled. As the woman was shouting at Bobby Briggs to clear the road, the girl convulsed and leaned over toward the open driver-side window, vomiting a green liquid, which caused the woman to start screaming.
